# sidebar

**Type Property**

The sidebar of a tab view.

## Declaration

```swift
static let sidebar: TabBarPlacement
```

## Discussion

A tab bar can appear as a sidebar in [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TabViewStyle/sidebarAdaptable] on iPad, macOS, visionOS, and tvOS.
title: sidebar
